roleset.name: preventing or delaying the development of cancer
roleset.note: CHEMOPREVENTION-N NOTES: Relation to verb-prevent.01. (from chemoprevention.01-n)

role.descr: theme, specific cancer whose development is being prevented
secondary predication; thing prevented (e.g. from metastasizing)

example.name: chemoprevent-v
example.text: In GTC-treated TRAMP mice [in which]-2 [tumor progression]-1 was chemoprevented *-1 *-2, CLU mRNA and protein progressively accumulated in the prostate gland.

example.name: chemoprevention-n
example.text: Considerable evidence supports the effectiveness of aspirin for chemoprevention of colorectal cancer

example.name: chemopreventative-j
example.text: ...selenium supplementation is chemopreventative for reducing cancer risks.
